message: This document is useful to all programmers of all levels
name: Job Description for Programmers
caption: www.eveandersson.com
description: ArsDigita builds and distributes the ArsDigita Community System (ACS), an open-source application development platform and suite of enterprise applications

data.message:
Why are they mentioning CVS
Why are square bullet points used
Why are they mentioning something called "AOLserver"

Conceptually this might be good advice, but I feel traumatized and scared and vulnerable.

This document was written as a guideline for a company in the 90s called ArsDigiita. AOLServer is their application server, something like IIS or Tomcat or mod_php. They mention CVS because it was written in the 90s before SVN, git, hg, etc.
